title: Strengthening Systems Design Competencies: Reflective Dispositions and Collaborative Knowledge Building Through Small-Group Biblical Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced language analysis skills and professional (medical/legal/technical) background knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate open-mindedness during biblical text interpretation with ≥ 80% frequency through small-group collaboration.
Learners can improve understanding of biblical study topics by 30% compared to pre-assessment through responsible knowledge-building activities in a social learning environment.
Learners can articulate their belief systems via reflective journaling and peer feedback analysis, achieving ≥ 90% satisfaction by course completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
